[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-datasource-protocol](./harp-datasource-protocol.md) &gt; [MarkerTechniqueParams](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.md)

## MarkerTechniqueParams interface

Technique that describes icons with labels. Used in \[\[PoiTechnique\]\] and \[\[LineMarkerTechnique\]\] (for road shields).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MarkerTechniqueParams extends BaseTechniqueParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [alwaysOnTop](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.alwaysontop.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, the label will always be rendered on top. If overlapping with other labels with this flag set, the render order is undefined.  <code>false</code> |
|  [backgroundColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.backgroundcolor.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylecolor.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Text background color in hexadecimal or CSS-style notation, for example: <code>&quot;#e4e9ec&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;#fff&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;rgb(255, 0, 0)&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;hsl(35, 11%, 88%)&quot;</code>.  color-hex |
|  [backgroundOpacity](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.backgroundopacity.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Background text opacity value. |
|  [backgroundSize](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.backgroundsize.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Size of the text background (pixels). |
|  [canvasRotation](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.canvasrotation.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | \[\[TextCanvas\]\] rotation (radians). |
|  [color](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.color.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylecolor.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Text color in hexadecimal or CSS-style notation, for example: <code>&quot;#e4e9ec&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;#fff&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;rgb(255, 0, 0)&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;hsl(35, 11%, 88%)&quot;</code>.  color-hex |
|  [distanceScale](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.distancescale.md) | number | Scaling factor of icon. Defaults to 0.5, reducing the size ot 50% in the distance. |
|  [fontName](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.fontname.md) | string | Name of the preferred \[\[Font\]\] to be used when rendering. |
|  [fontStyle](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.fontstyle.md) | "Regular" \| "Bold" \| "Italic" \| "BoldItalic" | Glyph style to apply for the currently active \[\[Font\]\]. |
|  [fontVariant](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.fontvariant.md) | "Regular" \| "AllCaps" \| "SmallCaps" | Glyph variant to apply for the currently active \[\[Font\]\]. |
|  [hAlignment](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.halignment.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;"Left" \| "Center" \| "Right"&gt; | Text position regarding the baseline. The \[\[placements\]\] attribute may override the alignment settings. |
|  [iconBrightness](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.iconbrightness.md) | number | Icon brightness.<!-- -->Factor that multiplies a color on top of the icon texture (and <code>iconColor</code>) with <code>0</code> being fully black as final output, <code>1</code> being the original rgb colors of the texture. <code>1</code> |
|  [iconColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.iconcolor.md) | [StyleColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylecolor.md) | Icon color.<!-- -->If specified, combined using multiplication with color value read from icon texture.<!-- -->Works best for grayscale or monochromatic textures. |
|  [iconFadeTime](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.iconfadetime.md) | number | Fading time for icons in seconds. |
|  [iconIsOptional](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.iconisoptional.md) | boolean | If true, the text will appear even if the icon cannot be rendered because of missing icon graphics. Defaults to <code>true</code>. |
|  [iconMaxZoomLevel](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.iconmaxzoomlevel.md) | number | Maximum zoomLevel at which to display the label icon. No default. |
|  [iconMayOverlap](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.iconmayoverlap.md) | boolean | If <code>false</code>, the icon may overlap text and other icons of lower priority. If not defined, the property value from <code>textMayOverlap</code> will be used.  <code>false</code> |
|  [iconMinZoomLevel](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.iconminzoomlevel.md) | number | Minimum zoomLevel at which to display the label icon. No default. |
|  [iconReserveSpace](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.iconreservespace.md) | boolean | If <code>false</code>, icon will not reserve screen space, other markers will be able to overlap. If not defined, the property value from <code>iconReserveSpace</code> will be used.  <code>true</code> |
|  [iconScale](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.iconscale.md) | number | Scaling factor of icon. |
|  [iconXOffset](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.iconxoffset.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Horizontal offset (to the right) in screen pixels. |
|  [iconYOffset](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.iconyoffset.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Vertical offset (up) in screen pixels. |
|  [imageTexture](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.imagetexture.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;string&gt; | Name of \[\[ImageTexture\]\] definition to use. |
|  [imageTextureField](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.imagetexturefield.md) | string | Field name to extract imageTexture content from. |
|  [imageTexturePostfix](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.imagetexturepostfix.md) | string | Postfix for <code>imageTexture</code> if <code>imageTextureField</code> is used. |
|  [imageTexturePrefix](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.imagetextureprefix.md) | string | Prefix for <code>imageTexture</code> if <code>imageTextureField</code> is used. |
|  [label](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.label.md) | string | Field name of object containing the text to be rendered.<!-- -->@<!-- -->deprecated, Use <code>[&quot;get&quot;, &quot;FIELD&quot;]</code>. |
|  [leading](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.leading.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Inter-line spacing (pixels). Scaled by <code>size</code>. |
|  [lineRotation](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.linerotation.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Line typesetting rotation (radians). |
|  [lineWidth](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.linewidth.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Maximum line width (pixels). |
|  [maxLines](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.maxlines.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Maximum number of lines for this label. |
|  [minDistance](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.mindistance.md) | number | Minimal distance between markers in screen pixels. |
|  [opacity](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.opacity.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | For transparent text, set a value between 0.0 for totally transparent, to 1.0 for totally opaque. |
|  [placements](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.placements.md) | string | Text label positions relative to the label central position (anchor point).<!-- -->This attribute defines a comma separated tokens of possible text placements relative to label central position (anchor), for example: "TL, TR, C". Keep in mind that horizontal placement defines text position in opposite way to the alignment, so the text <code>R</code> placed (located on the \*\*right side\*\* of label position) will be the same as <code>Left</code> aligned by deduction. On other side vertical placement is quite similar to vertical alignment so <code>T</code> placement corresponds with <code>Above</code> alignment. This attribute may override \[\[hAlignment\]\] and \[\[vAlignment\]\] if defined. |
|  [poiName](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.poiname.md) | string | Fixed name to identify POI options in the POI table. If <code>poiName</code> has a value, this value supersedes any value read from the field referenced in <code>poiNameField</code>. |
|  [poiNameField](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.poinamefield.md) | string | Name of the field to evaluate to get the name of the POI options in the POI table. |
|  [poiTable](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.poitable.md) | string | Name of the POI table which should be used for this POI. |
|  [priority](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.priority.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Priority of marker, defaults to <code>0</code>. Markers with highest priority get placed first. |
|  [renderTextDuringMovements](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.rendertextduringmovements.md) | boolean | If <code>false</code>, text will not be rendered during animations. Defaults to <code>true</code>. |
|  [rotation](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.rotation.md) | number | Glyph local rotation (radians). |
|  [screenHeight](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.screenheight.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Vertical height in pixels, controls vertical scaling. Overrides <code>iconScale</code>. |
|  [screenWidth](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.screenwidth.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Horizontal height in pixels, controls horizontal scaling. Overrides <code>iconScale</code>. |
|  [showOnMap](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.showonmap.md) | boolean | Should be displayed on map or not. Defaults to <code>true</code>. |
|  [size](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.size.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Size of the text (pixels). |
|  [stackMode](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.stackmode.md) | [PoiStackMode](./harp-datasource-protocol.poistackmode.md) | Specify stack mode. Defaults to <code>ShowInStack</code>. |
|  [style](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.style.md) | string | Name of the text style. |
|  [text](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.text.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;string&gt; | Text to be displayed for feature.<!-- -->Defaults to first defined: - feature property <code>label</code> if present in technique (deprecated) - <code>[&quot;get&quot;, &quot;name:short&quot;]</code> is <code>useAbbreviation</code> is true - <code>[&quot;get&quot;, &quot;iso_code&quot;]</code> is <code>useIsoCode</code> is true - <code>[&quot;get&quot;, &quot;name:$LANGUAGE&quot;]</code> for each specified language - <code>[&quot;get&quot;, &quot;name&quot;]</code>See \[\[ExtendedTileInfo.getFeatureText\]\] |
|  [textFadeTime](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.textfadetime.md) | number | Fading time for labels in seconds. |
|  [textIsOptional](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.textisoptional.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, icon will appear even if the text part is blocked by other labels. Defaults to <code>false</code>. |
|  [textMaxZoomLevel](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.textmaxzoomlevel.md) | number | Maximum zoomLevel at which to display the label text. No default. |
|  [textMayOverlap](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.textmayoverlap.md) | boolean | If <code>false</code>, text may overlap markers.  <code>false</code> |
|  [textMinZoomLevel](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.textminzoomlevel.md) | number | Minimum zoomLevel at which to display the label text. No default. |
|  [textReserveSpace](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.textreservespace.md) | boolean | If <code>false</code>, text will not reserve screen space, other markers will be able to overlap.  <code>true</code> |
|  [tracking](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.tracking.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Inter-glyph spacing (pixels). Scaled by <code>size</code>. |
|  [useAbbreviation](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.useabbreviation.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, the abbreviation (field <code>name:short</code>) of the elements is used as text. |
|  [useIsoCode](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.useisocode.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, the iso code (field 'iso\_code') of the elements is used as text. The <code>iso_code</code> field contains the ISO 3166-1 2-letter country code. |
|  [vAlignment](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.valignment.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;"Above" \| "Center" \| "Below"&gt; | Text position inside a line. The \[\[placements\]\] attribute may supersede it. |
|  [worldOffset](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.worldoffset.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | World space offset in meters applied to the icon. Valid only for icons which have the "offset\_direction" property as an attribute of the data. |
|  [wrappingMode](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.wrappingmode.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;"None" \| "Character" \| "Word"&gt; | Wrapping (line-breaking) mode. |
|  [xOffset](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.xoffset.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Horizontal offset (to the right) in screen pixels. |
|  [yOffset](./harp-datasource-protocol.markertechniqueparams.yoffset.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Vertical offset (up) in screen pixels. |
